patterns: Tell me about the music club
Do you have an Instagram handle for the aalap?
responses: KMIT's pioneering AALAP Music Club nurtures talent, promotes innovation, and embraces challenges, uniting music enthusiasts to explore, entertain, and connect.Explore   [AALAP - The Music Club of KMIT](https://www.instagram.com/aalapofficial/) on instagram for exciting event updates and more! 🎶.

patterns: Tell me about the drama club
Do you have an Instagram handle for abhinaya?
responses: ABHINAYA - The Drama Club of KMIT, fostering creativity through theatrical expressions. Stay updated on events and more at [Abhinaya on Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/abhinayathedramaclub//). 🎭

patterns: Tell me about the art club
Do you have an Instagram handle for aakarshan?
responses: AAKARSHAN - The Art Club of KMIT, unleashing creativity and artistic expression. Follow [Aakarshan on Instagram](hhttps://www.instagram.com/aakarshanofficial/) for updates on art events and projects. 🎨

patterns: Tell me about the dance club
Do you have an Instagram handle for mudra?
responses: MUDRA - The Dance Club of KMIT, where rhythm meets expression. Connect with [Mudra on Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/mudraofficial/) for dance event updates and more! 💃🕺

patterns: Tell me about the speaker's club
Do you have an Instagram handle for vachan?
responses: VACHAN - The Speaker's Club of KMIT, empowering voices and fostering eloquence. Follow [Vachan on Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/vachan.official/) for updates on speaking events and discussions. 🗣️

patterns: Tell me about the coding club

responses: RECURSE - The Coding Club of KMIT, where innovation meets code. Follow [Recurse on Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/recurse.official/) for coding challenges and tech updates. 💻🚀

patterns: Tell me about the yoga club
Do you have an Instagram handle for kaivalya?
responses: KAIVALYA - The Yoga Club of KMIT, fostering wellness and balance. Follow [Kaivalya on Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kaivalya_official/) for yoga sessions and well-being tips! 🧘‍♀️🌟

patterns: Tell me about the photography club
Do you have an Instagram handle for tol?
responses: TOL - The Photography Club, capturing moments in frames. Follow [TOL on Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/tracesoflenses/) for visual storytelling and photography updates! 📸🌄

patterns: Tell me about the sports club
Do you have an Instagram handle for kreeda?
responses: KREEDA - The Sports Club of KMIT, fostering a spirit of sportsmanship. Follow [Kreeda on Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kreedaofficial/) for sports events and updates! 🏆🏀

patterns: Tell me about the fashion club

responses: RITI - The Fashion Club of KMIT, where style meets creativity. Connect with [Riti on Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/riti._.official/) for fashion updates and showcases! 👗👠

patterns: Tell me about the curiosity club
Do you have an Instagram handle for curiosity?
responses: CURIOSITY - Club of KMIT, fostering a culture of questioning. Explore knowledge with [Curiosity on Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/club_curiosity/). 🧐📚

patterns: Do you have an Instagram handle for kmitra?
responses: KMITRA - The E-Magazine, showcasing creativity and insights. Stay connected with [KMITRA on Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kmitraofficial/) for literary updates and more! 📖✨

patterns: Tell me about the public relations club
Do you have an Instagram handle for pr?
responses: PR - The Public Relations Club, bridging connections and communication. Connect with [PR on Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/pr.kmit/) for updates on college events and more! 🤝📢

patterns: Tell me about the organizing committee
Do you have an Instagram handle for oc?
responses: OC - The Organizing Committee, orchestrating memorable events. Follow [OC on Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/oc.kmit//) for updates on college festivities and gatherings! 🎉📆

patterns: Tell me about the non-profit organization
Do you have an Instagram handle for nss?
responses: NSS - Non-Profit Organization at KMIT, serving society selflessly. "Nonprofit organization not me but you." Stay informed with [NSS on Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/nss.kmit/) for community initiatives and social impact! 🤝🌍

patterns: Tell me about the non-profit organization for greater good
Do you have an Instagram handle for rotaract?
what non-profit organization for greater good
responses: ROTARACT - Non-profit organization at KMIT, striving for the greater good. Connect with [Rotaract on Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/rotaract_kmit/) for impactful initiatives and community service! 🌐🤲

patterns: Do you have an Instagram handle for Street Cause?
responses: STREET CAUSE - A division of the largest student-run NGO in Hyderabad. "A life without a cause is a life without an effect." Connect with [Street Cause on Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/streetcause_kmit/) for community service and outreach activities! 🤝🌏

patterns: Tell me about the student committee
responses: The Student Committee includes OC (Organizing Committee) and PR (Public Relations), playing key roles in organizing events and enhancing college communication.

patterns: Tell me about the student body
responses: KMITRA is the student body at KMIT, responsible for the college's e-magazine and promoting literary and creative works within the student community.
External bodies of the college include NSS (National Service Scheme), Rotaract, and Street Cause. These organizations focus on community service and social impact beyond the college campus.

patterns: Tell me about the student clubs
What's Kaivalya, Aalap, Abhinaya, Aakarshan, Curiosity, Mudra, Recurse, Vachan, Kreeda, Traces of Lenses, Riti?
Kaivalya Aalap Abhinaya Aakarshan Curiosity Mudra Recurse Vachan Kreeda Traces of Lenses Riti
responses: Student clubs include Kaivalya (Yoga), Aalap (Music), Abhinaya (Drama), Aakarshan (Art), Curiosity, Mudra (Dance), Recurse (Coding), Vachan (Speaker's Club), Kreeda (Sports), Traces of Lenses (Photography), and Riti (Fashion). These clubs provide platforms for diverse interests and talents.

patterns: Tell me about KMIT's learning management system.
responses: [Tessellator](http://kmitonline.com/): KMIT's customized Moodle system with code compilation for JAVA, C, and more languages.

patterns: How to use Netra for attendance?
responses: For Netra, visit [Netra Attendance Tracker](http://teleuniv.co.in/netra-web/). For Drona, use [Drona Attendance Tracker](Drona_Attendance_Link).

patterns: How to use Sanjaya parent app?
responses: To access the parent app, visit [Sanjaya Parent App](http://teleuniv.co.in/sanjaya-web/).

patterns: How to check results on student.kmit.in?
responses: To check results, visit [Student Result Portal](http://portal.teleuniv.in/).
Click here for the  [Project Tracker Link](http://projectschool.kmitonline.com/).
Click here for the  [Project Tracker Link](https://tesseractonline.com/).

patterns: List sister colleges of this college
responses: [NGIT](https://ngit.ac.in/), [KMEC](http://kmec.in/)

patterns: What are the founding year of this college ?
when was keshav memorial institue of technology founded
responses: KMIT was established in the year 2007

patterns: when was neil gogte institue of technology founded
responses: [NGIT](https://ngit.ac.in/) is a sister concern of KMIT started in 2017

patterns: when was keshav memorial engineering college founded
responses: Keshav Memorial Engineering College [KMEC](http://kmec.in/) is the latest engineering institute to be launched by Keshav Memorial Technical Educational Society

patterns: Who are the founders of KMIT?
Founding members of Keshav Memorial Institute of Technology
responses: The founders of KMIT are Mr. Neil Gogte and Mr. Nitin Sahasrabudhe.

patterns: Tell me about Mr. Neil Gogte
responses: Mr. Neil Gogte is the Founder Director of KMIT. He holds a Masters Degree in Computer Science from IIT - Mumbai and a B.E. degree from Osmania University. With over 25 years of experience in the IT industry, he is a visionary technocrat and entrepreneur.

patterns: Tell me about Mr. Nitin Sahasrabudhe
responses: Mr. Nitin Sahasrabudhe is the Director of Genesis Solutions Pvt. Ltd. He holds a Bachelor's degree in Electronics & Communications Engineering. With over 25 years of experience, he has worked in project and product sales in Healthcare and IT Industries.

patterns: Who are the HODs at KMIT?
Check HODs at Keshav Memorial Institute of Technology
responses: For information about the HODs at KMIT, visit [HODs at KMIT](https://www.kmit.in/administration/hod.php).
